shortdesc.ph: Adds or updates the effect of the specified video effect node and template.
Adds or updates a video effect for the specified video effect node ID and template.

p.codeblock: virtual int addOrUpdateVideoEffect(uint32_t nodeId, const char* templateName) = 0;

plentry.pd:
Unique identifier or combination of identifiers for the video effect node. See . Example:
Single effect: VIDEO_EFFECT_NODE_ID::BEAUTY
Combined effect: VIDEO_EFFECT_NODE_ID::BEAUTY | VIDEO_EFFECT_NODE_ID::STYLE_MAKEUP
Name of the effect template. If set to or an empty string, the SDK loads the default configuration from the resource package.
Unique identifier or combination of identifiers for the video effect node. See .
Name of the effect template. If set to null or an empty string, the SDK loads the default parameter configuration from the resource package.
